speds.net.version.description: The version of the SPEDS protocol used by the Network layer.

speds.net.reference.description: The reference of the SPEDS protocol version used by the Network layer.

speds.net.cert.description: A valid certificate used to verify data integrity

speds.net.private.key.description: The private key associated with the previous certificate used to sign digital data

speds.net.entities.description: The various entities known by the proxy and the address to communicate with them.
